languages.text: While the {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}braced{/g} effect lasts, the Navy Officer can use the {g|f:282940ecb99948a28adc9cb60374223b}Get off me!{/g} ability once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, and the targets of their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.
languages.original_text: Приготовиться! также позволяет офицерам Имперского флота использовать в области угрозы любое {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}дистанционное{/g} оружие, а также {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидывать{/g} противников и {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}отталкивать{/g} их на 1 клетку.

traits.locale_text: While the {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}braced{/g} effect lasts, the Navy Officer can use the {g|f:282940ecb99948a28adc9cb60374223b}Get off me!{/g} ability once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, and the targets of their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

While the {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}braced{/g} effect lasts, the Navy Officer can use the {g|f:282940ecb99948a28adc9cb60374223b}Get off me!{/g} ability once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, and the targets of their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

Brace for Impact! also allows the Navy officer to use any {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} in threatened areas, knocks enemies {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} them 1 cell away during the effect.

While the {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}braced{/g} effect lasts, the Navy Officer can use the {g|f:282940ecb99948a28adc9cb60374223b}Get off me!{/g} ability once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, and the targets of their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

languages.text: Solange der {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}Gestützt{/g}-Effekt andauert, kann der Offizier der Flotte einmal pro {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} die Fähigkeit {g|f:282940ecb99948a28adc9cb60374223b}Weg von mir!{/g} einsetzen und die Ziele seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g}auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} mit einem Abzug von −10 bestehen, um nicht {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g} zu werden.
languages.original_text: While the {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}braced{/g} effect lasts, the Navy Officer can use the {g|f:282940ecb99948a28adc9cb60374223b}Get off me!{/g} ability once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, and the targets of their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Solange der {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}Gestützt{/g}-Effekt andauert, kann der Offizier der Flotte einmal pro {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} die Fähigkeit {g|f:282940ecb99948a28adc9cb60374223b}Weg von mir!{/g} einsetzen und die Ziele seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g}auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} mit einem Abzug von −10 bestehen, um nicht {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g} zu werden.

languages.text: Tant que l'effet {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}Prêt{/g} est actif, l'officier de marine peut utiliser la capacité {g|f:282940ecb99948a28adc9cb60374223b}Lâchez-moi !{/g} une fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, et les cibles de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec une pénalité de −10, sans quoi elles sont {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}paralysées{/g}.
languages.original_text: While the {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}braced{/g} effect lasts, the Navy Officer can use the {g|f:282940ecb99948a28adc9cb60374223b}Get off me!{/g} ability once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, and the targets of their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Tant que l'effet {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}Prêt{/g} est actif, l'officier de marine peut utiliser la capacité {g|f:282940ecb99948a28adc9cb60374223b}Lâchez-moi !{/g} une fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, et les cibles de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec une pénalité de −10, sans quoi elles sont {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}paralysées{/g}.

Préparez-Vous à l'Impact ! permet également à l'officier de marine d'utiliser n'importe quelle arme {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}à distance{/g} dans les zones menacées, d'{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}immobiliser{/g} les ennemis et de les repousser de 1 case pendant toute la durée de l'effet.

languages.text: {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}准备就绪{/g}效果持续期间，海军军官每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中可以使用一次{g|f:282940ecb99948a28adc9cb60374223b}离我远点！{/g}这个能力。此外，被海军军官{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-10减值。若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态。
languages.original_text: While the {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}braced{/g} effect lasts, the Navy Officer can use the {g|f:282940ecb99948a28adc9cb60374223b}Get off me!{/g} ability once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, and the targets of their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}准备就绪{/g}效果持续期间，海军军官每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中可以使用一次{g|f:282940ecb99948a28adc9cb60374223b}离我远点！{/g}这个能力。此外，被海军军官{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-10减值。若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态。
迎接冲击！还可以让海军军官在近战威胁范围内使用{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}远程{/g}武器，令敌人陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}俯卧{/g}状态，并将该名敌人推开1格。

languages.text: Mientras el efecto {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}preparado{/g} está activo, el oficial de la Armada puede usar la capacidad {g|f:282940ecb99948a28adc9cb60374223b}¡Quítate de encima!{/g} una vez por {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} y los objetivos de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una penalización de −10 o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribados{/g}.
languages.original_text: While the {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}braced{/g} effect lasts, the Navy Officer can use the {g|f:282940ecb99948a28adc9cb60374223b}Get off me!{/g} ability once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, and the targets of their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Mientras el efecto {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}preparado{/g} está activo, el oficial de la Armada puede usar la capacidad {g|f:282940ecb99948a28adc9cb60374223b}¡Quítate de encima!{/g} una vez por {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} y los objetivos de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una penalización de −10 o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribados{/g}.

languages.text: {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}衝撃に備えろ{/g}の効果かぎり、海軍士官は{g|f:282940ecb99948a28adc9cb60374223b}離れろ！{/g}アビリティを1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ターン{/g}ごとに使用でき、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}の対象は−10のペナルティ付きで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}耐性判定{/g}に成功しなければ、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}転倒{/g}する。
languages.original_text: While the {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}braced{/g} effect lasts, the Navy Officer can use the {g|f:282940ecb99948a28adc9cb60374223b}Get off me!{/g} ability once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, and the targets of their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 衝撃に備えろ！はさらに、脅威エリア内で海軍士官が遠隔武器を使用し、敵を脆弱化状態にして、1セル押し戻すことを可能にする。
衝撃に備えろ！はさらに、脅威エリア内で海軍士官が{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}遠隔{/g}武器を使用し、敵を{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}状態にして、1セル押し戻すことを可能にする。

languages.text: Пока действует эффект {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}готовность{g|f:282940ecb99948a28adc9cb60374223b}, офицер может использовать способность {/g}Пошли прочь!{/g} 1 раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Цели атак персонажа в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −10 и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуты{/g}.
languages.original_text: While the {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}braced{/g} effect lasts, the Navy Officer can use the {g|f:282940ecb99948a28adc9cb60374223b}Get off me!{/g} ability once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, and the targets of their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Пока действует эффект {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}готовность{g|f:282940ecb99948a28adc9cb60374223b}, офицер может использовать способность {/g}Пошли прочь!{/g} 1 раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Цели атак персонажа в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −10 и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуты{/g}.

Пока действует эффект {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}готовность{g|f:282940ecb99948a28adc9cb60374223b}, офицер может использовать способность {/g}Пошли прочь!{/g} 1 раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Цели атак персонажа в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −10 и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуты{/g}.

Пока действует эффект {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}готовность{g|f:282940ecb99948a28adc9cb60374223b}, офицер может использовать способность {/g}Пошли прочь!{/g} 1 раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Цели атак персонажа в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −10 и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}обездвижены{/g}.

languages.text: Donanma Subayı, {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}Çarpışmaya hazır{/g} etkisi devam ettiği sürece her {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} bir kez {g|f:282940ecb99948a28adc9cb60374223b}Bas git!{/g} kabiliyetini kullanabilir. Ayrıca, yaptığı {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırılarının{/g} hedefleri −10 ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilirler{/g}.
languages.original_text: While the {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}braced{/g} effect lasts, the Navy Officer can use the {g|f:282940ecb99948a28adc9cb60374223b}Get off me!{/g} ability once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, and the targets of their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Donanma Subayı, {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}Çarpışmaya hazır{/g} etkisi devam ettiği sürece her {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} bir kez {g|f:282940ecb99948a28adc9cb60374223b}Bas git!{/g} kabiliyetini kullanabilir. Ayrıca, yaptığı {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırılarının{/g} hedefleri −10 ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilirler{/g}.

languages.text: During the effect of Brace for Impact! the Navy Officer's melee attacks knock enemies prone if they fail AGI test (-10) and can use {g|f:282940ecb99948a28adc9cb60374223b}Get off me!{/g} ability once.

traits.locale_text: During the effect of Brace for Impact! the Navy Officer's melee attacks knock enemies prone if they fail AGI test (-10) and can use {g|f:282940ecb99948a28adc9cb60374223b}Get off me!{/g} ability once.
